title: A Cut Above The Rest: Top Floor Flat w/ Optional Parking & W/D *Video*
posting_body: Mission: Hip & Modern Top Floor Flat w/ Optional Parking & in-unit W/D near 24th Street
**You can watch a video walkthrough of the actual apartment here: <URL>
**To schedule an in-person tour at your preferred times, go to: <URL>
This top floor 1 bedroom flat at 23rd & Harrison is just what you've been looking for!
Bright and modern with big open spaces, high ceilings and skylights, this flat makes a very comfortable home.
Hardwood floors throughout and well thought out storage systems are great bonuses.
A high quality paint job in the perfect colors create a stylish abode.
The bars and restaurants along 24th Street are only a block away.
Nearest BART/Muni station (24th Street) is 4 blocks away.
Private washer and dryer in unit.
Oversized garage is available for $250/mo additional, most SUVs will fit.
Pets considered on a case by case basis.
Qualified applicants will have established a good credit history and have sufficient verifiable income; guarantors are not being considered.
We look forward to hearing from you!
DRE# 02187202 (please don’t use the DRE# to request a showing; instead provide the property address: 1118 Florida St.)

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
Cats allowed on a case by case basis
Dogs allowed on a case by case basis, must be dog-friendly
